text: 21 A schedule is strict if a value written by a txn is not read or overwritten by other txns until that txn finishes. Advantages: — Does not incur cascading aborts. — Aborted txns can be undone by just restorj —E values of modified tuples. l_ “ 8e+#eb5b5n CMU Database Systems - 17 Two-Phase Locking Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
